teacher_info.intro: Люблю иностранные языки, научную фантастику, аниме и долгие пешие прогулки!
teacher_info.about_me: Люблю иностранные языки, научную фантастику, аниме и долгие пешие прогулки!
teacher_info.about_teacher: Я работаю в сфере преподавания много лет, поэтому знаю, как объяснить и научить:)
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Мои уроки включают:

Пробное занятие:
- где я узнаю уровень студента, его/её интересы, а также пожелания для следующих занятий

Говорение:
- любая тема (погода, музыка, книги, глобальное потепление, мир будущего и т.д.)
- обсуждение статьи, выбранной студентом или мной 

Чтение:
- помощь в понимании текста и переводе сложных для студента выражений

Мои занятия логичны и не лишены юмора:)
I can speak English and Japanese too. You’re welcome!

course_info.trial_description:
Разговорная практика, обсуждение темы в зависимости от уровня:)
Speaking practice, a topic discussion depending on your level:)

pro_course_detail.title: Разговорная практика (Speaking)
pro_course_detail.description:
Обсуждение темы в зависимости от уровня студента ("семья", "еда", "книги", "преимущества и недостатки работы из дома", "мир будущего" и т.д.)
A topic discussion depending on your level (e.g. 'family', 'food', 'books', 'the advantages and disadvantages of working from home', 'future world', etc)

pro_course_detail.title: Чтение (Reading)
pro_course_detail.description:
Помощь в понимании текста (статья в журнале или газете, книга, стихотворение и т.п.)
If you need some help in understanding a text (a newspaper/magazine article, a book or a poem, etc)

pro_course_detail.title: English (Speaking)
pro_course_detail.description: DIscussing interesting topics depending on your level. I'll help you expand your vocabulary and feel more confident while speaking English

teacher_info.intro:
Привет! Меня зовут Роман, мне 30 лет, я родился и живу в Санкт-Петербурге. Я люблю преподавать, люблю русский язык и Россию, сам русский, и считаю, что это идеальное сочетание для преподавания русского языка. Я также свободно владею английским языком, который преподавал как в России, так и в Китае
***
Hi, my name is Roman, 30, I'm from St. Petersburg, Russia. I fluently speak both English and Russian language. I really enjoy studying and teaching English because I’ve spent nearly my whole life learning it via all sorts of sources: school, English courses, books, movies, music and fellow native speakers as well, so I value this knowledge a lot.
teacher_info.about_me:
Привет! Меня зовут Роман, мне 30 лет, я родился и живу в Санкт-Петербурге. Я люблю преподавать, люблю русский язык и Россию, сам русский, и считаю, что это идеальное сочетание для преподавания русского языка. Я также свободно владею английским языком, который преподавал как в России, так и в Китае
***
Hi, my name is Roman, 30, I'm from St. Petersburg, Russia. I fluently speak both English and Russian language. I really enjoy studying and teaching English because I’ve spent nearly my whole life learning it via all sorts of sources: school, English courses, books, movies, music and fellow native speakers as well, so I value this knowledge a lot.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
Я всегда ответственно подхожу к процессу обучения. Мне важно чтобы каждый мой ученик получал удовольствие от уроков, не останавливался на достигнутом, а мои занятия мотивировали на самостоятельное обучение и дальнейшее развитие. Иными словами, я стараюсь создать условия для раскрытия потенциала каждого своего ученика, учитывая его индивидуальные особенности и задачи.
***
I consider myself a very responsible teacher and it’s very important for me that the students enjoy every lesson, move forward and my classes provide them with motivation to keep studying in a day to day life. So I basically try to create suitable conditions for my students to reach their potential in every way
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Я стараюсь построить процесс обучения так, чтобы ученику было интересно заниматься, а полученные знания он мог с ходу применить в реальной жизни, поэтому я стараюсь максимально разнообразить свои уроки. Особое внимание я уделяю произношению и отработке коммуникативных навыков.
***
My lessons are intended to be interesting and useful, so the student could implement the knowledge from the lesson in the real life right away. I always try to come up with new and entertaining ways of teaching to keep my students engaged and motivated. I also pay extra attention to my students’ pronunciation and always looking forward to improve their interactive communication skills.

course_info.trial_description: Пробный урок русского языка, на котором мы познакомимся, определим цели, приоритеты и предпочтения в обучении, а я расскажу о своем подходе и представлю примерный план будущих уроков (Trial Russian language lesson, on which we'll get acquainted, set goals, priorities and preferences for our learning journey, and I'll present my teaching approach and approximate plan for our future lessons).

pro_course_detail.title: Урок русского языка (Russian language lesson)
pro_course_detail.description: Урок русского языка с легким уклоном в сторону разговорной практики (Russian language lesson with a slight emphasis on speaking practice). В ходе урока используются текстовые, аудио и видео материалы, а сами занятия интерактивны и направлены на создание максимально естественной языковой среды (Audio, video and reading materials are used during classes, while lessons themselves are aimed to create as natural speaking environment as possible)

teacher_info.intro: Hello everyone, my name is Darina, I am 25 years old Ukrainian girl from Kyiv, and I speak fluently Ukrainian, Russian, French and English! I'm in love with foreign languages and I really enjoy communication with people around the world,  this is why I help my international students in learning process.
teacher_info.about_me: Hello everyone, my name is Darina, I am 25 years old Ukrainian girl from Kyiv, and I speak fluently Ukrainian, Russian, French and English! I'm in love with foreign languages and I really enjoy communication with people around the world,  this is why I help my international students in learning process.
teacher_info.about_teacher: Learning of foreign languages gave me very strong understanding how this process can be fast and interesting. This is why my students are always motivated, have a possibility to enjoy efficient and not boring lessons that help to speak French, Ukrainian and Russian as soon as possible!
teacher_info.teaching_style: I prove that French, Ukrainian and Russian are not that hard as everyone thinks. My teaching method is very simple and efficient: a language cannot be learnt but practiced. This is why 70% of your time is dedicated to listening and speaking, compared to 30% devoted to grammatical theory (+homework). In fact, it helps to learn languages very quickly. Sure, I provide my lovely students with all materials they need.

course_info.trial_description: I would like to provide this trial lessons of Russian language and dedicate it to the explanation of the features of Russian Language. This will help us to understand your strengths and weaknesses, so we will be abble to improve them together.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for Begginers
pro_course_detail.description:
This is a basic fast-learning Russian language course for those who have never studied this language before. I will help you to pronounce correctly all Russian sounds, to learn to read in a short period of time, to understand clearly the main grammatical rules, to expand your vocabulary and to support typical conversations.
Also, if you are preparing your trip, this course can be fully dedicated to the improvement of communication in travel area, learning new useful words and phrases and creating typical conversations/letters/polite expressions you will need to use during your trip. It will be also useful for Travel Industry professionals.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for Speakers
pro_course_detail.description: This Russian language course is for those who have already experience in Russian. We will practice conversation, expand your vocabulary, work on weeknesses of grammar and the prononciation of all russian sounds.

pro_course_detail.title: Ukrainian for Beginners
pro_course_detail.description:
This is a basic fast-learning Ukrainian language course for those who have never studied this language before. I will help you to pronounce correctly all Ukrainain sounds, to learn to read in a short period of time, to understand clearly the main grammatical rules, to expand your vocabulary and to support typical conversations.
Also, if you are preparing your trip, this course can be fully dedicated to the improvement of communication in travel area, learning new useful words and phrases and creating typical conversations/letters/polite expressions you will need to use during your trip. It will be also useful for Travel Industry professionals.

pro_course_detail.title: French for Beginners
pro_course_detail.description:
This is a basic fast-learning French language course for those who have never studied this language before. I will help you to pronounce correctly all French sounds, to learn to read in a short period of time, to understand clearly the main grammatical rules, to expand your vocabulary and to support typical conversations.
Also, if you are preparing your trip, this course can be fully dedicated to the improvement of communication in travel area, learning new useful words and phrases and creating typical conversations/letters/polite expressions you will need to use during your trip. It will be also useful for Travel Industry professionals.

pro_course_detail.title: Ukrainian for Speakers
pro_course_detail.description: This Ukrainian language course is for those who have already experience in Ukrainian. We will practice conversation, expand your vocabulary, work on weeknesses of grammar and the prononciation of all Ukrainian sounds.

pro_course_detail.title: French for Speakers
pro_course_detail.description: This Frenchlanguage course is for those who have already experience in French. We will practice conversation, expand your vocabulary, work on weeknesses of grammar and the prononciation of all French sounds.

teacher_info.intro: Hello, friends! My name is Mikhail. I like to travel, watch interesting movies and read books.
teacher_info.introduction:
Hello, friends! My name is Mikhail. I am from Russia and I graduated in Russian language and literature. So if you looking for a conversational partner to practice your speaking skills, have questions about grammar or may be interested in Russian everyday slang, I would be glad to help you. In my lessons we can talk about music, movies, literature, traveling, history, politics and so on. Also we can read and discuss interesting books, watch scenes from Russian movies, write short stories and letters, and so on. 

Привет, друзья! Меня зовут Михаил. Я из России, окончил педагогический институт по специальности русский язык и литература. Поэтому я охотно готов вам помочь с изучением русского языка. На занятиях мы можем обсуждать с вами кино, музыку, литературу, путешествия, историю, политику и т. д. Также мы можем читать и разбирать интересные книги, смотреть сцены из российских фильмов, сочинять небольшие рассказы, писать письма. И делать еще много всего другого.
teacher_info.about_me: Hello, friends! My name is Mikhail. I like to travel, watch interesting movies and read books.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
Hello, friends! My name is Mikhail. I am from Russia and I graduated in Russian language and literature. I would be glad to help you with your Russian.

Привет, друзья! Меня зовут Михаил. Я из России, окончил педагогический институт по специальности русский язык и литература. Поэтому я охотно готов вам помочь с изучением русского языка.
teacher_info.teaching_style: Depending on your needs our lessons we can study some grammar, read texts and learn new words along the way. Or if you prefer more relaxed approach we can just talk about topics that you are interested in.

course_info.trial_description: On trial lesson we can talk about your experience and background in Russian, discuss your goals and preferences. It will let me evaluate your Russian so I can prepare classes according to your level.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for beginners
pro_course_detail.description: If you know nothing about Russian or just started learning it, this course is for you. Here you can learn russian alphabet, basic grammar and most common words.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian grammar for A2 - B2 levels
pro_course_detail.description: These lessons are meant for those who already know some Russian but have problems understanding grammar. We can review most difficult parts of it, such as cases, verb aspect, verbs of motion and so on.

pro_course_detail.title: Speaking practice
pro_course_detail.description: On this lesson we can talk about different topics that you are interested in and learn some new words and grammar aspects.

teacher_info.intro:
Hello! My name is Tonia and I live in Greece. My native language is not only Greek,but Russian as well. Experts call it "biligual" ! ))) 
I graduated from university as a social worker. However,people often asked me to help them or their children with one or the other language. Because of my belief :" if you want to help someone , who is hungry,don't give him fish, but give him a fishing rod and teach him to fish", all of a sudden, I found myself teaching. So, my professional activity, little by little, turned its way to tutoring!)))
teacher_info.about_me:
Hello! My name is Tonia and I live in Greece. My native language is not only Greek,but Russian as well. Experts call it "biligual" ! ))) 
I graduated from university as a social worker. However,people often asked me to help them or their children with one or the other language. Because of my belief :" if you want to help someone , who is hungry,don't give him fish, but give him a fishing rod and teach him to fish", all of a sudden, I found myself teaching. So, my professional activity, little by little, turned its way to tutoring!)))
teacher_info.about_teacher:
A bad teacher describes,a good - explains, an excellent - shows and a great - inspires! 
I'm not interesred of being a great teacher but I really want to inspire you to keep learning languages and meeting other cultures!!! That's why I believe that aquisition of a language is much more than simple learning. 
Learning by memorizing lists of vocabulary and grammar can be important ,but aquisition means that you not only learn but apply those principles in the real world. 
Italki platform gives us this opportunity to put all that knowledge to use through real communication with native speakers of the language you learn!!!
teacher_info.teaching_style: When a student is engaged in critical thinking,he/she stops paying so much attention to grammar and details of vocabulary,start focusing on what he/she thinks, feels and believes and then start talking.And this is the purpose of the lesson,to make you speak in a free way without fear of mistakes.Furthermore, you will be able to improve your pronunciation and,if there is a need,we can work with the articulation of some letters which are difficult to pronounce or with the combination of consonants (in Russian).In addition,you will be taught how to expand your vocabulary and how to convert your passive lexicon into active.Finally,grammar.We can work with your own material or I can provide some

course_info.trial_description: This is an opportunity for you to see how the lesson is going to be and if it responds to your expectations.Also, a plan of lessons can be made to achieve your goals .

pro_course_detail.title: Let's speak Russian
pro_course_detail.description:
Этот урок для тех, кто :

- хочет попрактиковать свой русский: от простых фраз, диалогов, которых встречаем в повседневных ситуациях до обсуждения книг

- хочет чувствовать себя уверенно в общении с носителями русского языка  

- хочет научиться правильному произношению 

- хочет справиться со сложным сочетанием согласных в словах

-и хочет научиться новым словам и фразам

In this lesson you can exercise all you have already learnt :from simple words and phrases, dialogues in everyday situations to a discussion of a topic . It depends on how far you have reached in you studies ! So,feel free to write me your academic level and which issue you would like to discuss! 

I can support you with developing your pronunciation skills and adding new words to your vocabulary.
Additionally, I can give you some tips how to enrich your lexicon and how to activate your passive vocabulary.

Буду очень рада пообщаться с Вами , помочь и поддержать Вас на этом нелегком пути изучения русского языка !

pro_course_detail.title: Let's speak Greek
pro_course_detail.description:
Το μάθημα αυτό είναι για όσους:

- θέλουν να εξασκήσουν τα ελληνικά τους:από απλές φράσεις και διαλόγους που συναντάμε σε καθημερινές καταστάσεις μέχρι συζητήσεις πάνω σε επίκαιρα θέματα ή για βιβλία

- θέλουν να μιλούν ελληνικά με σιγουριά

- θέλουν να δουλέψουν με την προφορά τους 

- θέλουν να μάθουν να προφέρουν σωστά το Θ και το Δ 

- θέλουν να μάθουν νέες λέξεις και φράσεις


In this lesson you can exercise all you have already learnt :from simple words and phrases, dialogues in everyday situations to a discussion of a topic . It depends on how far you have reached in you studies ! So,feel free to write me your academic level and which issue you would like to discuss! 
I can support you with developing your pronunciation skills and adding new words to your vocabulary.
Additionally, I can give you some tips how to enrich your lexicon and how to activate your passive vocabulary.

Θα χαρώ πολύ να συζητήσω μαζί σας και να σας στηρίξω σ'αυτό το μεγάλο ταξίδι της εκμάθησης της ελληνικής γλώσσας!))

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for two
pro_course_detail.description:
This is a lesson for students who would like to learn in pair !
For academic level from A1 to B2. Working with reading,spelling,grammar.

pro_course_detail.title: Learning Greek
pro_course_detail.description:
This lesson is for people who wants to learn Greek from zero or want to increase their level ! 
You can learn:
-alphabet
-reading
- writing
-grammar
Also, you can:
- improve your pronunciation
- work with the difficulties that you meet in the language

pro_course_detail.title: Learning Russian
pro_course_detail.description:
This lesson is for people who wants to learn Russian from zero or want to increase their level ! 
You can learn:
-alphabet
-reading
- writing
-grammar

Also, you can:
- improve your pronunciation
- work with the difficulties that you meet in the language

teacher_info.intro: Hello! My name is Nika. I live in Baku, Azerbaijan. I love languages, books, yoga and painting. I even have a little book blog, where I share my experiences.
teacher_info.short_signature: Conversational English Tutor with 2 years experience | ESL Instructor
teacher_info.about_me: Hello! My name is Nika. I live in Baku, Azerbaijan. I love languages, books, yoga and painting. I even have a little book blog, where I share my experiences.
teacher_info.about_teacher: I have been teaching Conversational English for 2 years now. It is amazing! Watching progress and improvement of the students, seeing the results of interactive conversational lessons is the best reward. So this teaching practice made me understand my greatest passion in life, which is helping people to explore new languages.
teacher_info.teaching_style: All of my lessons are based on fun conversations related to our chosen topics, it can be any grammar points, new vocabulary, new phrases, TV show/movie discussions. The topics are being chosen according to the level of the student.

course_info.trial_description:
Hey there! If you want to try out my lessons, but hesitate it, you can book a trial to make it all clear!

See you!

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational English to improve speaking skills
pro_course_detail.description:
Learn how to have an English conversation and gain confidence speaking English with this course!

Having conversations is a really important part of life. Especially if you are in a new country, or learning a new language, conversation is the best way to improve your day-to-day routine. 

This course guides you through the depth of Conversational English, teaching you how to deal with any kind of conversation and improve your vocabulary through interactive learning. This will give you great confidence the next time you want to discuss anything in English.

pro_course_detail.title: General English for Kids | interactive English with activities and games
pro_course_detail.description:
This course develops English skills of children 6-11 age. The course is intended to be held in interactive form in order to make kids interested.

Learner outcomes include improved ability to read and understand English vocabulary and simple and more complex sentences, to write, understand and use accurately verb tenses, nouns/pronouns, and articles.

pro_course_detail.title: IELTS Speaking Practice
pro_course_detail.description:
The objective of this course is to focus on:

How the exam works.
Strategies for success.
Improving your lexical resource.
Key pronunciation areas of connected speech and word stress.
Using the correct tense.
Dealing with problems.

pro_course_detail.title: Разговорный Русский язык для А1- С1 | Conversational Russian for A1-C1
pro_course_detail.description: Этот курс предназначен для практики разговорной речи иностранных студентов. Все материалы предоставляются в электроном виде.

pro_course_detail.title: Azərbaycan dili A1-B2 | General Azerbaijani A1-B2
pro_course_detail.description: Bu kurs sırf danışıq üzrə qurulur. Bütün dil səviyyələri üçün açıqdır. Dərs materialları elektron şəkildə təqdim olunur.

pro_course_detail.title: Русский язык для А1- С1 | General Russian for A1-C1
pro_course_detail.description: Этот курс предназначен для изучения грамматики, чтения и произношения на русском языке для иностранных студентов. Все материалы предоставляются в электроном виде.

teacher_info.intro:
Privet! My name is Annie and I'm an interior designer from the third capital of Russia — Yekaterinburg. I'm currently learning Finnish and also working on perfecting my English. 

I think that language learning with a native speaker is the most productive one and that's the reason why I became a community tutor because I really want to help people who are brave enough to dare to learn Russian. And I also really want to end up with this "nazdorov'e" thing. No one says it here, guys! :D
teacher_info.about_me:
Privet! My name is Annie and I'm an interior designer from the third capital of Russia — Yekaterinburg. I'm currently learning Finnish and also working on perfecting my English. 

I think that language learning with a native speaker is the most productive one and that's the reason why I became a community tutor because I really want to help people who are brave enough to dare to learn Russian. And I also really want to end up with this "nazdorov'e" thing. No one says it here, guys! :D
teacher_info.about_teacher: I’ve been studying languages on Italki for a year now, so I know what students expect from their community tutors and what components help to design a great lesson. We'll build our classes considering your goals and I’ll do my best to provide you with the knowledge that is going to be handy in real life.
teacher_info.teaching_style: Our first class will be about figuring out what you know and how do you want our lessons to be designed. I enjoy helping students expand their vocabulary and remembering Russian words by making associations and finding English words that sound alike.

course_info.trial_description:
During our first class we'll get to know one another or if you would like to do something specific during the lesson don't forget to text me before.

*there are no refunds for cancellations received less than 3 hours before the scheduled lessons

pro_course_detail.title: Conversation Practice
pro_course_detail.description:
This class is for conversation practice using any topics you're interested in. I like to discuss specific things, so if you came across an interesting article or have specific questions about the language I would be glad to build our hour around these kinds of things.

*there are no refunds for cancellations received less than 3 hours before the scheduled lessons

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for beginners
pro_course_detail.description:
Privet! Welcome to the Russian language! Let's start your journey with the basic Russian words and phrases!

*there are no refunds for cancellations received less than 3 hours before the scheduled lessons

teacher_info.intro: Здравствуйте! Меня зовут Елена. Я являюсь носителем русского языка и очень люблю преподавать. Я очень общительный и открытый человек. Люблю спорт, люблю путешествовать. Самая главная моя страсть -это изучение языков, хотя , признаюсь, что это далеко не так легко. Получаю огромное удовольствие от вождения автомобиля)). Также я явлюсь волонтером- помогаю людям и животным в трудных ситуациях.
teacher_info.about_me: Здравствуйте! Меня зовут Елена. Я являюсь носителем русского языка и очень люблю преподавать. Я очень общительный и открытый человек. Люблю спорт, люблю путешествовать. Самая главная моя страсть -это изучение языков, хотя , признаюсь, что это далеко не так легко. Получаю огромное удовольствие от вождения автомобиля)). Также я явлюсь волонтером- помогаю людям и животным в трудных ситуациях.
teacher_info.about_teacher: Преподаванием занимаюсь не так давно, пришло это внезапно, когда столкнулась с тем, что студентам нужна помощь в изучении языков.
teacher_info.teaching_style: Так как я давно изучаю английский и знаю как это трудно, то с уверенностью могу сказать, что преподавать нужно курсом, шаг за шагом изучать грамматику, правописание и произношение. Я подбираю литературу и использую всевозможные ресурсы.

course_info.trial_description: Знакомство на пробном уроке. Определение уровня знаний и умений, а затем выбор будущей тактики в изучении.

pro_course_detail.title: Русский язык.
pro_course_detail.description: Изучение русского языка с помощью живого общения. Акцент на правописание ( с помощью небольших текстов). Используя аудирование улучшаем качество речи с помощью пересказа. Также отличный способ -описание изображений.

teacher_info.intro: Hey! My name is Olga and I learned three languages on my own without the help of a teacher and a grammar book
teacher_info.about_me: Hey! My name is Olga and I learned three languages on my own without the help of a teacher and a grammar book
teacher_info.about_teacher:
How I may help you?
1. I tell you how to overcome the language barrier and start speaking with native-speakers with no fear.
2. I share my methods on how to maintain your language skills even though you don't have time during the day.
3. I help you create your own language learning schedule to achieve the best results.

I aim to motivate and inspire language learners to reach their fluency goals.
teacher_info.teaching_style: I don't put grammar in the first place in my lessons, because I'm a hard believer, that grammar only slows down the process of learning a new language. I help you find the best method that will be perfect for you and your language-goals.

course_info.trial_description: Our trial lesson is designed to allow you to understand if my teaching methods suit your personality and your learnings goals

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational Russian for Intermediate
pro_course_detail.description: I help students to develop ease in the conversational use of the language and at the same time understand how to create a plan for language learning.

pro_course_detail.title: Ukrainian for beginners and intermediate level
pro_course_detail.description: We will learn Ukrainian alphabet, basic daily phrases, step-by-step you will know how to communicate and express yourself fluently in Ukrainian. Also we can practice a conversation and improve your speaking skills.

teacher_info.intro:
My name is Zuzu.
I'm from Kyrgyzstan and I'm now living in Istanbul. By traveling a lot I've taught myself several languages and I know very well how difficult it can be to learn a new language. But I'm here to help you!
teacher_info.about_me:
My name is Zuzu.
I'm from Kyrgyzstan and I'm now living in Istanbul. By traveling a lot I've taught myself several languages and I know very well how difficult it can be to learn a new language. But I'm here to help you!
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I have several years of experience as a language tutor and I know how to help you in the best way. 
By nature I'm a very happy and outgoing person and my lessons are filled with friendly conversation and laughter. 
I will give you a fun start learning the language and I know that you'll reach your goals with me!
teacher_info.teaching_style:
My lessons will be very different dependent on your goals and your current level in the languange.
It will contain some of the following exercises:

1) Conversation and phrases
2) Reading and writing
3) Listening and understanding audio and video
4) Grammar
5) Home work
6) Talking club - practice!

I very much look forward to see you!

course_info.trial_description: знакомство,приветствие, особенности культуры и разговорная практика , а  также для путешественников!

pro_course_detail.title: разговорная практика
pro_course_detail.description: Знакомство, диалоги, фразы ,тексты , полезная информация, и в основном практика! Дружеская и интересная беседа!.

pro_course_detail.title: Разговорная практика!
pro_course_detail.description: Знакомство, диалоги, фразы, беседы, чтение, интересные разговоры и полезные информации! Дружеское общение!

pro_course_detail.title: для путешественников
pro_course_detail.description: Английский для начинающих, чтение, транскрипция, произношения, фразы , диалоги, пересказы, аудирование  и  разговорная практика!

pro_course_detail.title: Для путешественников!
pro_course_detail.description: Чтение турецкого языка, основные фразы для туристов или  кто решил переехать в эту страну, разговорная практика.

teacher_info.intro:
Hi! My name is Sveta! I’m from Russia, where I was born and raised. I’m a teacher and I love Russia and Russian language. 
Меня зовут Света! Я из России. Я очень люблю свою страну и свой родной язык. Я работаю учителем. Это мое призвание. Это мое любимое занятие.
teacher_info.short_signature: Преподаватель, который всегда учится и совершенствуется!
teacher_info.about_me:
Hi! My name is Sveta! I’m from Russia, where I was born and raised. I’m a teacher and I love Russia and Russian language. 
Меня зовут Света! Я из России. Я очень люблю свою страну и свой родной язык. Я работаю учителем. Это мое призвание. Это мое любимое занятие.
teacher_info.about_teacher: Я дружелюбна и терпелива. Я считаю, что для овладения языком, нужна регулярная практика. Язык нужен для общения. И мы с тобой будем говорить на Русском языке, даже если ты еще совсем новичок.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I can help you to improve your Russian skills. 
Я помогу тебе улучшить свой Русский язык. Я помогу разобраться в грамматике и произношении, чтении и письме.

course_info.trial_description: Привет! На нашем пробном уроке мы можем познакомиться, определить твой уровень и договориться о способах проведения дальнейших занятий!

pro_course_detail.title: Practice Russian with a Native Speaker
pro_course_detail.description:
Let's practice Russian with me! We will talk about everything you want and also I'll help you to improve your Russian speaking skills, pronounciation, grammar and vocabulary! This is a great way for you to practice Russian! Our lessons will be fun and useful! Welcome! 
Привет! Давай практиковать русский со мной! Мы можем говорить на любую тему, которая тебе интересна, я помогу тебе с произношением и грамматикой. Наши уроки будут проходить весело и интересно! Записывайся!

teacher_info.intro: Hello! My name is Daniela and I'm a certified polyglot. I live in Hungary, I grew up in a bilingual environment speaking Russian and Hungarian. I mainly specialize in these two languages, however I can help with English and Italian too.
teacher_info.about_me: Hello! My name is Daniela and I'm a certified polyglot. I live in Hungary, I grew up in a bilingual environment speaking Russian and Hungarian. I mainly specialize in these two languages, however I can help with English and Italian too.
teacher_info.about_teacher: As a teacher I'm flexible and adapt my lessons to every student individually. I guide them through their language learning process and encourage them to speak from the early stages.
teacher_info.teaching_style: My teaching style is mainly based on speaking as I know from experience how difficult it can be to start speaking confidently in a foreign language. I encourage my students to speak from day one and to learn the language in a more fun and relaxed way!

course_info.trial_description: Let's have a trial lesson, this way we can see if you like my teaching style and want to continue having lessons with me!

pro_course_detail.title: Russian (A1-C2)
pro_course_detail.description: We will practice speaking and grammar. You will be able to put in practice your knowledge of Russian and expand your vocabulary.  I adapt my lessons to my students-perfect for beginners.

pro_course_detail.title: Hungarian (A1-C2)
pro_course_detail.description: I'm bilingual in Russian-Hungarian. I offer lessons for beginners from Hungarian. I adapt my lessons to my students- Perfect for beginners!

pro_course_detail.title: English A1-B2
pro_course_detail.description: If you want to practice your English and learn new expressions, look no further! English for beginners and intermediate students.

teacher_info.intro:
I get to teach languages online to people from all over the world. I have technical and financial higher educations, but I have found that I love teaching languages even more. I enjoy meeting and teaching different groups of learners. I will be glad to help learners who have little free time because of their job or studying to get new interesting and useful knowledge.
I am personally interested in a various subjects, including professional literature, philosophy, psychology and astrology.
teacher_info.about_me:
I get to teach languages online to people from all over the world. I have technical and financial higher educations, but I have found that I love teaching languages even more. I enjoy meeting and teaching different groups of learners. I will be glad to help learners who have little free time because of their job or studying to get new interesting and useful knowledge.
I am personally interested in a various subjects, including professional literature, philosophy, psychology and astrology.
teacher_info.about_teacher: I make sure my students understand the main concept before moving to the next level. Every stage builds on base of the prior one, so understanding of each level is essential.
teacher_info.teaching_style: My teaching style is integrated, but also it includes learning from an academic standpoint. My lessons are built coherently. At the end of the every lesson, we make short analytical review so that you can see your current results. Goals are set with each student individually, which helps to keep you on track with your learning aims.

course_info.trial_description:
The trial lesson is a perfect chance to interchange each other's information; it is a convenient method to let me know which are your central aims and preferences as a language learner, and it is also the moment to let you see my teaching style and the teaching resources that I use.
Feel free to contact me:)

pro_course_detail.title: Articles for reading and discussion.
pro_course_detail.description:
- articles prepared by the teacher for the lesson
- focus on reading, speaking, listening
- discussion of topics
- homework including either reading or writing

pro_course_detail.title: Traditional grammar and writing
pro_course_detail.description:
- presentation mode by the teacher
- practice with examination-style questions
- academic, creative, business writing
- homework including reading, writing or word memorization

pro_course_detail.title: Informal tutoring
pro_course_detail.description:
- informal conversation 
- discussion of different topics and free conversation
- focus on speaking practice

pro_course_detail.title: Informal tutoring
pro_course_detail.description:
- informal conversation 
- discussion of different topics and free conversation
- focus on speaking practice

pro_course_detail.title: Informal tutoring

- discussion of different topics and free conversation
- focus on speaking practice

teacher_info.intro:
Hello, my name is Valerie and I am Russian. I have a philological education, but I also studied Philosophy of Art and  Business Analysis in IT. I live and work as an English and Spanish teacher in Saint-Petersburg, which is in the North of my country. 
I adore travelling and reading. My sin is to buy books or take them in the library, put in piles and just look at how wonderful they appear :) of course, I find time to read them so far. 
I am in constant movement in which I try to find peace. Because of that I am keen on yoga and cycling. 
My dream is to live by the sea or in the forest, but for now I am a city dweller which brigs its benefits as well. I like visiting museums and theatres.
teacher_info.about_me:
Hello, my name is Valerie and I am Russian. I have a philological education, but I also studied Philosophy of Art and  Business Analysis in IT. I live and work as an English and Spanish teacher in Saint-Petersburg, which is in the North of my country. 
I adore travelling and reading. My sin is to buy books or take them in the library, put in piles and just look at how wonderful they appear :) of course, I find time to read them so far. 
I am in constant movement in which I try to find peace. Because of that I am keen on yoga and cycling. 
My dream is to live by the sea or in the forest, but for now I am a city dweller which brigs its benefits as well. I like visiting museums and theatres.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I am a self-made teacher as I have always been interested in educational process. I used to observe my teachers when I was at school and university, and mentioned meticulously their styles. 
I suppose I have elaborated my own style of teaching but I am constantly learning, trying to keep up with paste of the world. 
I believe that practice makes the improvement possible, however sometimes it's difficult to have motivation. On my classes I do my best to inspire the students in language learning as it is a long and hard process. Еhe road is mastered by the walking.
teacher_info.teaching_style: I combine academic and communicative approach, when the student both learns through conversation and by means of discussing and analyzing the grammar. Also I insist on doing the homework! On first class we get acquainted and I learn what the person is interested in, so that to offer appropriate the topics for discussion. While having classes we play games, watch, read and discuss the information taken, do tasks and prepare creative tasks. Learning should be pleasure!

course_info.trial_description: We will chit-chat in a friendly manner to get acquainted, state the current mood, set up some goals and deadlines. Some listening and writing tasks will also be provided so that to check the level.

pro_course_detail.title: Introduction to Russian language
pro_course_detail.description: We will learn how to greet people and say goodbye; how to introduce yourself in Russian; ask simple questions 'What/Who is it?'; look up closely at some pronunciation problems; get acquainted with the alphabet. If you already know something in Russian, we will delve deeper, revising the previous material.

pro_course_detail.title: English speaking class
pro_course_detail.description: In this class, in an unconstrained manner, we will discuss any topic needed to refresh the knowledge of the language, revise specific vocabulary, or simply enjoy speaking a foreign language. I will provide all necessary materials, together with a comfortable environment for you to share your expertise and ideas.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian language Speaking class
pro_course_detail.description: A great opportunity to refresh your speaking skills: revise general vocabulary and add new words; delve deeper into grammar; prepare for the trip of job interview. In any case, we discuss the needs in advance, and I design the class specifically for you.

pro_course_detail.title: CAE\CPE preparation
pro_course_detail.description: As a person who successfully passed the CPE exam, I will be glad to share my experience. I also helped other people to prepare for Proficiency and other Cambridge exams, and know some tricks and tips to share.

teacher_info.intro:
My name is Olga. I was born in Saint Petersburg, and I also grew up there. I like travelling, reading classical literature, watching old movies and swimming in the sea for a long time. 🐬
I also take lessons of modern dance.
Several years ago I became interested in learning foreign languages. Once I studied Italian and Spanish, and this year I've been studying Japanese and talking to Japanese native speakers on Italki.
I'm a professional speech therapist, and teaching is my passion. I love searching new efficient methods for mastering new languages.
teacher_info.about_me:
My name is Olga. I was born in Saint Petersburg, and I also grew up there. I like travelling, reading classical literature, watching old movies and swimming in the sea for a long time. 🐬
I also take lessons of modern dance.
Several years ago I became interested in learning foreign languages. Once I studied Italian and Spanish, and this year I've been studying Japanese and talking to Japanese native speakers on Italki.
I'm a professional speech therapist, and teaching is my passion. I love searching new efficient methods for mastering new languages.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I like setting goals and choosing the best learning strategy, to improve one's skills in a language consistently and constantly.
I teach Russian in Russian (directly). Please keep it in mind if you're a beginner. I prepare lessons with PPT files where I show you how Russian words can be translated into English, Spanish, Italian or Japanese. A Quizlet set is provided for each lesson so that you can review the vocabulary.
I offer different formats of learning (live classes to work on specific grammar or vocabulary topics, free conversations, exchanging text, audio or video messages). 
I am patient, friendly, and I am ready to listen to you and help you out with whatever you might need.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I will be glad to prepare a lesson specifically for you, to work on a particular topic you're interested in.
I also enjoy preparing Power Point presentations for my classes, where I use efficient methods to help you learn new grammar and vocabulary. I like describing pictures in Russian. I also prepare Quizlet sets so that you can review the words you studied.
I let my students practice grammar in different exercises and use it in dialogues at the same lesson.
We can also have free conversations and discuss any topics you're interested in, or read a textbook.
Besides, you can tell me about any specific goals you have, and I'll help you reach them.

course_info.trial_description: Share your goals of studying Russian with me and I'll prepare a lesson specifically for your needs. We can also discuss some topics you're interested in.

pro_course_detail.title: Vocabulary and Grammar Lessons
pro_course_detail.description: For this kind of lessons, I use Power Point presentations, where the new words are given with English, Spanish, Italian or Japanese translations. There are pictures and fun tasks provided to learn grammar and vocabulary topics that you are interested in. There is also a Quizlet set prepared for every lesson.

pro_course_detail.title: Reading
pro_course_detail.description:
I can find for you some interesting materials about Russian culture and history (for example, about Russian tsars, famous poets and writers, scientists and artists). You might also be interested in reading fairy tales or some funny stories. In all the texts the stressed syllables will be marked for your convenience.
After we finish reading the text, we can answer some questions based on it or discuss it.

teacher_info.intro:
I sincerely believe that Heaven experience is on Earth! I am the one who is responsible for my own Heaven! I believe that the Heaven starts with a smile and continues with discovering the world around me through the eyes of a child. So I am a traveler, a big fan of trekking trips and galaxies that I discover through faces and stories of people. 
I am from Moldova, it’s a country where a big part of people talks in two very different languages in their origins and musicality. Our national language is Romanian. The Russian language comes from the historical events, but I prefer to see the luminous part of this thing, I feel myself lucky that I can discover the Russian literature in original .
teacher_info.about_me:
I sincerely believe that Heaven experience is on Earth! I am the one who is responsible for my own Heaven! I believe that the Heaven starts with a smile and continues with discovering the world around me through the eyes of a child. So I am a traveler, a big fan of trekking trips and galaxies that I discover through faces and stories of people. 
I am from Moldova, it’s a country where a big part of people talks in two very different languages in their origins and musicality. Our national language is Romanian. The Russian language comes from the historical events, but I prefer to see the luminous part of this thing, I feel myself lucky that I can discover the Russian literature in original .
teacher_info.about_teacher: Several years ago I finished Academy of Art as an actor. I can speak very clearly with no accent in both languages. And this thing I learned during my acting studies which offered me a base of diction exercise. Also I am a teacher of Art of speaking at the Language Center - “Oratorica “ where I teach exercises that help students to get rid of speech defects  and incorrect pronunciation or unwanted accents . However I believe that accent is one of the cutest things. I lived in Romania more than a year where I tried to discover as much as possible about history, accents, dialects and culture.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
What I can offer : 
1 . I am very open to any ideas.
2. For beginners we can start from zero , no worries.
3. We can practice a dialogue improvisation that will help developing courage and easiness of speaking. We will imagine the situation, the characters like a little movie and I hope we will have much fun. 
4. Exercises that will put the base of correct pronunciation , I can explain the musicality of language and where the sounds are born. 
5. As a homework, based on your taste I can recommend a selection of movies, animation, music that will help you to improve the language, to discover the culture and fell in love with the language.

pro_course_detail.title: Informal Tutoring
pro_course_detail.description:
1 . I am very open to any ideas.
2. For beginners we can start from zero , no worries.
3. We can practice a dialogue improvisation that will help developing courage and easiness of speaking. We will imagine the situation, the characters like a little movie and I hope we will have much fun. 
4. Exercises that will put the base of correct pronunciation , I can explain the musicality of language and where the sounds are born. 
5. As a homework, based on your taste I can recommend a selection of movies, animation, music that will help you to improve the language, to discover the culture and fell in love with the language.

pro_course_detail.title: Informal Tutoring
pro_course_detail.description:
1 . I am very open to any ideas.

3. We can practice a dialogue improvisation that will help developing courage and easiness of speaking. We will imagine the situation, the characters like a little movie and I hope we will have a lot of fun. 
4. Exercises that will put the base of correct pronunciation, I can explain the musicality of language and where the sounds are born. 
5. As a homework, based on your taste I can recommend a selection of movies, animation, music that will help you to improve the language, to discover the culture and fell in love with the language.

teacher_info.intro:
Languages are my passion. I love what I do, I have a steady source of motivation that drives me to do my by best. 
Traveling is my other passion. It is so thrilling to see a new place and meet different kind of people. Every time when I travel, I take my camera and shot interesting pictures of buildings, monuments, bazaars etc. It gives me immense satisfaction and pleasure. Though these hobbies are expensive, I love them.
teacher_info.about_me:
Languages are my passion. I love what I do, I have a steady source of motivation that drives me to do my by best. 
Traveling is my other passion. It is so thrilling to see a new place and meet different kind of people. Every time when I travel, I take my camera and shot interesting pictures of buildings, monuments, bazaars etc. It gives me immense satisfaction and pleasure. Though these hobbies are expensive, I love them.
teacher_info.about_teacher: Hello and welcome to italki! My name is Albina and I'm a qualified Russian and English teacher. I hold a Bachelor's Degree in Linguistics. I've been a teacher more than 3 years teaching Russian as a Foreign language and English as a Second Language.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I provide a highly customized lesson for every student. I make sure that every lesson is tailored to the student’s individual needs, interests and learning pace. 

If you would like to practise speaking, we can do more conversation-based activities. Through our real conversations, we are able to discover lots of new language and phrases that natives use, in their natural environment. If you'd like to work on grammar or pronunciation, we can do so.

Depending on the student's learning goals, I can give homework and provide with the materials I have.

exp_info.company: a private teacher/ an online teacher

edu_info.description: Linguistics: Translation and Translation Studies (Russian, English, French)

cert_info.description: Theory and Practice of Russian as a Foreign Language

course_info.trial_description:
Hello everyone! Book a trial lesson to start learning Russian.
Please, write me your language level before starting our classes.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversation practice
pro_course_detail.description:
This lesson includes speaking, grammar, reading, pronunciation. 
I look forward to work with all of you.
After you book a class, I'll ask some questions about your level and preferences.

pro_course_detail.title: General English
pro_course_detail.description: This course is for A2-B1 level students who have difficulty learning English. In my classes I use textbooks, listening tasks, grammar.

teacher_info.intro:
Hello! Glad to see you on my page.
My name is Margarita. I graduated from the University with a degree in Management in Ukraine, and also Moscow State University with a degree in Russian as a Foreign Language. My work experience is 2 years. I teach students from around the world, adults and children from 13 years old. Russian is my first mother tongue. I also know Ukrainian, I speak English well and a little bit German. I try to constantly improve my teaching skills and attend various webinars that take place at the Russian language center of Moscow State University.
teacher_info.short_signature: Certified tutor with more than 2 years of experience
teacher_info.about_me:
Hello! Glad to see you on my page.
My name is Margarita. I graduated from the University with a degree in Management in Ukraine, and also Moscow State University with a degree in Russian as a Foreign Language. My work experience is 2 years. I teach students from around the world, adults and children from 13 years old. Russian is my first mother tongue. I also know Ukrainian, I speak English well and a little bit German. I try to constantly improve my teaching skills and attend various webinars that take place at the Russian language center of Moscow State University.
teacher_info.about_teacher: For lessons, I use modern high-quality materials, electronic textbooks, media materials that meet international standards. In the lesson, we cover all aspects of the language: increasing vocabulary, improving the quality of speech (grammar, pronunciation), listening training. My methodology focuses on practice and structured grammar. Courses and curriculum will be tailored based on your personal skills, requests, goals.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I understand how difficult it is sometimes to learn a foreign language and what difficulties students face. Now I am studying German and I understand it from my own experience. For me, the Russian language is a system, understanding which you can easily speak Russian and overcome the language barrier. Let's be honest - the Russian language is not easy. But with the right approach and program, you can simply enjoy learning Russian. Also in each lesson, we will learn something new about Russian traditions and culture. Acquaintance with Russian traditions is an integral component in language learning.

I will be glad to teach you Russian!

exp_info.job: Преподаватель по русскому языку как иностранному

course_info.trial_description: In a trial lesson, we check the level of the student's language. We are talking about the goals of learning Russian. Choosing a program that is more suitable for you. And we begin the study.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for level "beginners - A1"
pro_course_detail.description: Learning Russian starting with the alphabet, reading rules. Learning basic grammar, reading, and listening. Suitable for those who have never studied Russian before. + Homework. All explanations in English.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for level "A1 - А2"
pro_course_detail.description: General language learning with a special textbook. Each lesson is a new topic, grammar, reading, listening, pronunciation practice. + Homework.

pro_course_detail.title: Reading for level "B2-C2"
pro_course_detail.description: At each lesson, reading the text and discussion. Also doing exercises after the text to memorize new vocabulary. Textbook "Русский день за днём".

teacher_info.intro:
Меня зовут Таня. Я носитель русского языка. Я родом из Беларуси и живу тоже тут. 
Работаю в логистике и мечтаю попробовать себя в чем-нибудь еще.
По натуре, я эмоциональный и открытый человек, люблю проводить свободное время с друзьями, читать книги, путешествовать, смотреть фильмы и сериалы, рисовать и готовить. А еще я очень люблю вкусно покушать.
Мне нравятся интересные вопросы, например, если у меня спросить 3 вещи, которые я люблю больше всего, то я не задумываясь отвечу: пятница, море и шоколад.
teacher_info.about_me:
Меня зовут Таня. Я носитель русского языка. Я родом из Беларуси и живу тоже тут. 
Работаю в логистике и мечтаю попробовать себя в чем-нибудь еще.
По натуре, я эмоциональный и открытый человек, люблю проводить свободное время с друзьями, читать книги, путешествовать, смотреть фильмы и сериалы, рисовать и готовить. А еще я очень люблю вкусно покушать.
Мне нравятся интересные вопросы, например, если у меня спросить 3 вещи, которые я люблю больше всего, то я не задумываясь отвечу: пятница, море и шоколад.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
Я буду рада познакомиться с тобой и постараюсь помочь тебе освоить новый язык на italki.
Мои занятия будут направлены на улучшение навыков разговорного языка.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Мой стиль преподавания прост. В течение урока мы будем говорить на интересующие вас темы.
Я точно знаю, чтобы стать увереннее и говорить на новом языке свободно, нужно просто пробовать говорить обо всем подряд.
Буду рада увидеться на уроке!

course_info.trial_description: Добро пожаловать! Пробный урок поможет развеять все ваши страхи и сомнения. Также вы сможете задать все интересующие вас вопросы.

pro_course_detail.title: Разговорная практика
pro_course_detail.description: Давайте знакомиться? Обсудим новости, погоду, традиции, праздники, спорт, медицину и много чего другого.. а заодно узнаем популярные фразы, русские пословицы,поговорки и современный сленг.

teacher_info.intro:
¡Hola a todos! Ciao a tutti! Hello everyone! Всем привет!

My name is Svetlana, and I was born and raised in Moscow. 
Languages are my passion, and I will happily help you to learn Russian, my native language.
I enjoy talking to people from different countries, learning about their cultures, and sharing my knowledge about the Russian language and culture with others. I realised that while studying languages myself, which encouraged me to quit my job as an economist and devote myself to studying and teaching languages. I’ve been teaching Russian online since 2018.
teacher_info.about_me:
¡Hola a todos! Ciao a tutti! Hello everyone! Всем привет!

My name is Svetlana, and I was born and raised in Moscow. 
Languages are my passion, and I will happily help you to learn Russian, my native language.
I enjoy talking to people from different countries, learning about their cultures, and sharing my knowledge about the Russian language and culture with others. I realised that while studying languages myself, which encouraged me to quit my job as an economist and devote myself to studying and teaching languages. I’ve been teaching Russian online since 2018.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
As a language learner myself, I know that the main thing is to be able to convey your message and be understood, which is why my lessons are focused on working on fluency. 
I adapt my Russian and make it comprehensible to learners of different levels, so you will find that you are already able to understand Russian no matter how beginner you are.
I am an open-minded and easy-going person, and we can talk about a gran variety of topics.
I create a friendly atmosphere in my classes, which will help you express yourself with no barrier, and with no fear. 
I study foreign languages, so I’m able to put myself in your shoes and share the techniques I use myself for effective language learning.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
- During the lesson, we can just talk in a friendly and relaxed way or we can discuss a particular topic of your choice. I will send you materials such as videos, articles, podcast if you need me to beforehand. 
 - For the students who are native or fluent in Spanish, Italian or English, I also offer structured lessons to beginners as well as students at an intermediate or advanced level. Even if you are an absolute beginner I can teach in one of these languages while still making the lessons interactive.

course_info.trial_description:
This lesson is for us to get to know each other, for me to understand which type of learner you are and for you to understand if I am the right teacher for you:)
I will assess your current level, we will talk about your goals, I’ll resolve your doubts about the lesson types I offer if you need me to.

pro_course_detail.title: Friendly conversation  – speak without a barrier!
pro_course_detail.description:
This type of lesson is for students who want to immerse fully into the language: no matter how beginner you are, we will speak only in Russian. 
I am extremely patient and friendly, and I know how to adapt the pace of speech, the vocabulary I use to each level of Russian. I will also write down new vocabulary in the chat, so that you can review it after the lesson.
Don’t be afraid to miss something out: in real life, we don’t need to understand 100% of what is being said to communicate successfully either;) You will understand more and more every time we talk, and you will soon realize that even being a beginner, you can communicate in Russian.

pro_course_detail.title: Structured Russian lessons – for all levels
pro_course_detail.description:
Structured lessons for all levels. 
If you start from zero learning Russian and a native (or a fluent) speaker of Spanish, English or Italian, this course is perfect for you. I am fluent in these languages and have experience teaching Russian at a beginners, intermediate and advanced level in all of them.
We will develop all language skills: speaking, listening and reading, and we will also work on your pronunciation – at each level. I will also assign writing exercises.
I use a bunch of materials: textbooks, online resources, podcasts, videos, songs, and I will check your homework before the lesson so that we can save the time of the class to practice.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversation practice – topic on your choice
pro_course_detail.description:
The difference with the other conversational lesson in my profile is that for this lesson, I will send you materials in advance on a topic you want to discuss during the class if you need me to. These might be pdfs with texts and exercises, audios, videos, articles etc. so that you can review and learn some vocabulary to be able to use it during our conversation. 

You can also write an essay as homework on that topic after we discuss it and I will check before the next lesson and explain to you all the mistakes afterwards.
